about_the_game:
You woke up and have no idea how you got here. At first, you think you might have been kidnapped, but it doesn't seem that way at all. In a place called "the Academy," you're instructed to follow the guidelines given to you through the speakers. There are things you need to learn, remember, no truth can remain hidden forever.

"Exitus," an interactive fiction experience that blends elements of thriller and mystery, touches upon the curiosity of players, compelling them to unravel what is happening here.

FEATURES


The power to write your destiny. (Multiple endings)
An experience that unfolds as you play, interpreted with your mental power.
A slowly revealed, mysterious, and suspenseful narrative.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION


One hundred twenty minutes of gameplay. (With all endings)
Pay attention to details and everything you hear to understand the story comfortably.

THIS IS AN INDEPENDENT GAME.
